titleInfo.title: Taking Fingerprints of Speech-And-Gesture Ensembles. Approaching Empirical Evidence of Intrapersonal Alignment in Multimodal Communication

place.placeTerm: London, UK: King’s College and Queen Mary University of London

titleInfo.title: Proceedings of 12th Workshop on Semantics and Pragmatics of Dialogue
